notes: also used as a farewell interjection
example_sentence_italian: Dico arrivederci e me ne vado.

notes: invariable noun; plural identical to singular

example_sentence_english: I have experienced some painful goodbyes.
We make a toast to the goodbye.
Months have passed since the goodbye.
There is hope in the goodbye.
I write a chapter on the goodbye.
I wrap everything up with the goodbye.
We talk about the final goodbyes.
I do not recover from the goodbyes.
I have written pages on goodbyes.

notes: contraction of con + gli (less common; also "con gli")
example_sentence_english: We close the discussion with the goodbyes.
